# FIGURES TABLES


Example syntax for figures and tables


```{r figure-example}

knitr::include_graphics("relative/path/to/img.svg")

```



Tables:  Can use `knitr::kable()`:

```{r table-example}

#knitr::kable(
#  mtcars[1:6, 1:6], caption = 'A subset of mtcars.'
#)

```

    123     123       123          123
      1     1          1             1
